message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand its significance to you, and I am confident it will bring great benefits to your endeavors. After careful consideration, I propose to sell this product to you for $950,000. This offer allows us both to benefit from the transaction, ensuring that you receive a high-quality asset at a reasonable price, while also maximizing the return on my investment. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and offers an excellent opportunity for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of concluding this transaction soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.
